item.title: BnAAP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnAAP1 Gene Name: amino acid permease 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Three amino acid permeases, BnAAP1, BnAAP2, and BnAAP6, were identified and characterized.

item.title: BnAAP6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnAAP6 Gene Name: amino acid permease 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Three amino acid permeases, BnAAP1, BnAAP2, and BnAAP6, were identified and characterized.

item.title: CsSEF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSEF1 Gene Name: putative CCCH-type zinc finger protein Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Expression of CsSEF1 gene encoding putative CCCH zinc finger protein is induced by defoliation and prolonged darkness in cucumber fruit.

item.title: FvebZIPs1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FvebZIPs1.1 Gene Name: basic leucine zipper transcription factor s1.

item.title: GmPT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14g188000 Gene Symbol: GmPT7 Gene Name: Phosphate Transporter7 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: JrPPO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrPPO1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrPPO1 was highly expressed in stems, young leaves, mature leaves, catkins, pistils, and hulls.

item.title: JrPPO2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrPPO2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrPPO2 was highly expressed in mature leaves and pistils.

item.title: MdFRK2

item.title: MdHT2.2

item.title: MePIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MePIP2|7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Found that the cassava aquaporin MePIP2|7|MePIP2|7 was involved in Mg2+ transport through interaction with MeMGT9, a lower affinity magnesium transporter protein.

item.title: NtCP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP2 Gene Name: cysteine protease 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP2 has a high similarity to KDEL-tailed cysteine proteinases and is expressed in mature green leaves.

item.title: Pu-miR172d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pu-miR172d Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: Pu-miR172d regulates stomatal density and water-use efficiency via targeting PuGTL1 in poplar.

item.title: VvSIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvSIP1 Gene Name: small basic intrinsic protein 1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: The grape aquaporin VvSIP1 transports water across the ER membrane.
